content: Boundaries of the see of Hereford
summary: 16 lines of text in English on the recto of a formerly blank leaf (fol. 8) of a Latin evangeliary written in England probably in s. ximed (Ker 1957, p. 125). Manuscript at Hereford Cathedral in s. xi.

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 8r) Ðus ligð þæt bisceoprice into hereforda

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Old English text is sixteen lines.

admin: Manuscript described by Mary Swan and Owen Roberson, with the assistance of Sanne van der Schee; ed. by Takako Kato (2010; 2013).
